bll

Class CompositeProduct

  • java.lang.Object
    • bll.MenuItem
      • bll.CompositeProduct
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CompositeProduct
extends MenuItem
    This class creates composite menu items which basically contains more base products, being able to create a menu (e. g. soup, second plate, dessert, coke)
    Author:
    BB
    See Also:
